a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (13)

p.k:
The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed.
Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens (2020).
